Items.Title: Oversight - Increasing Self-Identification by New York City Veterans.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Increasing Self-Identification by New York City Veterans.

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing June 25, 2025, as the 75th anniversary of the beginning of the Korean War and commemorating June 25 annually as Korean War Remembrance Day in the City of New York to honor those who served and to express hope for a lasting peace.
Items.MatterName: Recognizing June 25, 2025, as the 75th anniversary of the beginning of the Korean War and commemorating June 25 annually as Korean War Remembrance Day in the City of New York.
